main.proffession: and I'm a front end developer

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.textUpper: My layouts will work on any device, big or small.
responsive.textLower: The range of supported extensions from small 320px screen devices to large 1920px+ monitor wide screens.

fast.title: Fast
fast.textUpper: Fast load times my highest priority.
fast.textLower: Optimization with the help of various auditors using best practices of image optimization, minification and compression, code splitting, etc.

browser.title: Cross-browser
browser.textUpper: Providing all of required features in your browser list.
browser.textLower: Supporting of all modern browsers including Edge and IE11 with helping of Post CSS, Babel and different polyfills.

code.title: Code quality
code.textUpper: Scalable, structured, clean and well organized code.
code.textLower: My main goal during development process and I always try to achieve it with DRY, KISS, YAGN principes and using code best practices.

about.text: I have serious passion for creating web interfaces and their development. Details about my education or work experience you can find in my
